entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
